response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and highly valuable product. This item holds immense significance and potential worth to me, but I believe its true value can be realized under your ownership. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $750,000. This is an exclusive chance to secure a piece that could potentially appreciate in value over time and bring you unparalleled benefits. I trust that you will appreciate its worth and consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 750000}
